isis.stitle: 5 SPEED AND 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - ASSEMBLE - MAINSHAFT ASSEMBLY (FS-5306/6306)

svcproc.title: MAINSHAFT ASSEMBLY (FS-5306/6306)

note.para: Lubricate the gear bearing bores, gear hub faces, split washers, synchronizer friction surfaces, synchronizer cups and the mainshaft with transmission lube as the mainshaft is assembled. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubes.
Do not heat reverse bearing race over 320°F (160°C).

svcproc.para: The following step numbers correspond to the numbers in Figure 131.

step1.para: With the mainshaft rear facing up, install the mainshaft assembly vertically in a vise.
Install 1st gear bearings.
Install 1st gear with 1st gear clutching teeth down.
Install clutch hub with reverse gear clutch hub notched teeth facing down.
Install snap ring.
Install sliding clutch with reverse gear sliding clutch counterbore up.
Install reverse gear bearings.
Install reverse gear with reverse gear clutching teeth facing down.
Install reverse gear washer. Washer can be installed either way.
Use a sleeve type bearing driver or heat lamp and install the rear mainshaft bearing.

svcproc.para: The following step numbers correspond to the numbers in Figure 132.

step1.para: With the mainshaft front facing up, install mainshaft assembly vertically in a vise.
Install 1st-2nd synchronizer and cups.
Install 2nd gear bearings.
Install 2nd gear with 2nd gear clutching teeth down.
Install locating ball and washer in the mainshaft groove. Washer can be installed either way.
Install snap ring in the mainshaft groove.
Install 3rd gear bearings.
Install 3rd gear with 3rd gear clutching teeth up.
Install 3rd-4th clutch hub with 3rd-4th clutch hub stepped face up.
Install snap ring in the mainshaft groove.
Install 3rd-4th speed synchronizer and cups.
Install 4th gear bearings.
Install 4th gear with 4th gear clutching teeth down.
Install locating ball and washer. Washer can be installed either way.
Install snap ring in the mainshaft groove.
Install 5th gear bearings.
Install 5th gear with 5th gear clutching teeth up.
Install 5th-6th clutch hub with 5th-6th clutch hub flat surface facing up.
Install 5th-6th speed synchronizer and cups.
Use a sleeve type driver and install the front mainshaft bearing.
